## Summoner.league property

Get the summoner's competitive placement info.

Uses [LeagueManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.fetch.md) to get the details.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get league(): Promise<Collection<string, LeagueEntry>>;
```
